name: HTML Proofer on: [push, pull_request] jobs: proofer: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Setup Ruby uses: ruby/setup-ruby@v1 with: ruby-version: '3.2' bundler-cache: true - name: Install gems run: bundle install --path vendor/bundle - name: Fail if github.io links remain in source run: | if git grep -nE 'https?://[^"]*github\.io' -- ':!_site' ':!vendor' ':!node_modules'; then echo "::error ::Found github.io links in source. Replace with https://konstantinthumm.de" exit 1 fi - name: Build site run: JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build - name: Run html-proofer run: | gem install html-proofer htmlproofer ./_site \ --check-html --assume-extension --enforce-https --check-img-http \ --empty-alt-ignore=false
